protocol.object

Class ProtocolPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • protocol.object.ProtocolPlayer

  • public class ProtocolPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
    Spieler (Player)

    Contains information about player: player ID, color, name , status, score, and resources.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors
